title: Stonemail
data:
{{Obsolete}}

'''Stonemail''' was a better version of [[Stoneskin]], increasing the caster's [[AC]] for a period of time.

==History==
It was originally available as a [[spell]], but was changed into a random [[Xom]] effect at some point. In [[0.9]], it was removed from the game.

[[Category:Spells]] [[Category:Obsolete spells]] [[Category:Obsolete]]
